clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.getp.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.getpw
Warn on uses of the ‘getpw’ function.
The
clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.getpw
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.getp.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
